system.description:
You have learned to bring the natural world into your passion for inventing or vice versa. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When you use @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.f2syblzgm6at7i7q]{Tactical Chemistry}, you have the following additional choices:
    • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.vzy6r3gv8ylwoim7]{Antitoxin}
    • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.989ahbuhi1cqvrmy]{Bandage}
    • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.lamxdxcl7gqxy5zt]{Lavender Paste}
    • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.jpdzbf6ave90ugpq]{Medicinal Salve}
  • When you build a spell invention, you can choose to only use organic materials such as horn, wood, and leather in its construction. If you do, any spell invention constructed this way can also be used as a druid spellcasting focus.
  • Half your artificer levels count as druid levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3jdfihvtbyhbv9ez]{Wild Shape} feature.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in artificer, 3 levels in druid
